mapper.select: SELECT a.*, p.first_name, p.middle_name, p.last_name, p.gender, p.date_of_birth FROM applicants a JOIN persons p ON a.id = p.id WHERE a.guardian_id = #{guardianId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO persons (first_name, middle_name, last_name, gender, date_of_birth, person_type, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{middleName}, #{lastName}, #{gender}, #{dateOfBirth}, 'APPLICANT', #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}) RETURNING id
mapper.update:
UPDATE persons SET first_name = #{firstName}, middle_name = #{middleName}, last_name = #{lastName}, gender = #{gender}, date_of_birth = #{dateOfBirth}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE applicants SET application_status = #{applicationStatus}, payment_status = #{paymentStatus}, relationship_to_guardian = #{relationshipToGuardian}, submission_date = #{submissionDate}, previous_school_name = #{previousSchoolName}, previous_class = #{previousClass} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM applicants WHERE id = #{id}; DELETE FROM persons WHERE id = #{id};
